name: Euphoric
description:
#1
Let me take you to the journey, located in Langkat district, about 80km from Medan, Sumatera Utara. You can see beautiful scenery called Bukit Lawang. For the first series I'll take you to the famous bridge on Bukit Lawang, the bridge which split west area and east area, and a wide river below us. but before you arrived in Bukit Lawang, all you can see just Palm Oil Plantation and the important thing is broken road that makes you feel so far away from the place cause overload trucks which picking up the palm oils. By the way you will forgot about the road after you see these place. River, jungle, and the village blend into one in here.
A flood hit Bukit Lawang in 2003.The disaster destroyed the local tourist resorts and had devastating impact to the local tourism industry in the area. Around 400 houses, 3 mosques, 8 bridges, 280 kiosks and food stalls, 35 hotels and guest houses were destroyed by the flood, 239 people including 5 tourists were killed, and around 1,400 locals lost their homes. Local authorities and an environmental NGO attributed it to illegal logging, the village was rebuilt and re-opened again in July 2004. (references from wikipedia). So here we are now, with the beauty of mother earth.
